solids.math.laplacian_matrix(matrix: sympy.matrices.dense.MutableDenseMatrix, symbols: List[sympy.core.symbol.Symbol]) → sympy.matrices.dense.MutableDenseMatrix¶

Compute the element-wise scalar Laplacian of a 2-dimensional matrix.

Parameters
matrixsp.Matrix

2-dimensional matrix.

symbolsList[sp.Symbol]

Variables of which to compute the Laplacian with respect.

Returns
sp.Matrix

The element-wise scalar Laplacian.

References
